Translations.Text: Yi cangqiong he qi mingxing mengshi
ni zen neng zhidao qi mingxing shi shenmo
Shi na canlan de mingxing
Mei geren, dou youyige baohu zhe
Ren yingdang xiang yi xiang, ta ziji shi yong shenme zaocheng de
Ta shi bei shechu de jingye zaocheng de
Na jingye shi cong jizhu he leigu zhi jian fachu de
An la que shi neng shi ta fuyuan de
na shi yiqie mimi bei jiechuan zhi ri
Ta jue meiyou nengli, ye meiyou yuanzhu zhe
Yi han yu de yun
he you feng di di fashi
zhe que shi fenbie zhen wei de yanci
zhe bushi xiaohua
Tamen biding yao yong jimou
wo ye yao yong jimou
Suoyi ni dang kuanxian bu xindao de renmen, ni dang kuanxian tamen yixia
Ni dang zansong ni zhigao zhu de daming chaojue wanwu
ta chuangzao wanwu bing shi ge wu yunchen
Ta yuding wanwu, er jiayi yindao
Ta shengchu mucao
ranhou shi ta bian cheng heise de kucao
Wo jiang shi ni songdu, gu ni bu hui wangji
chufei an la suo yu wangji de. Ta dique zhidao xianzhu de he yin wei de yanxing
Wo jiang shi ni zunxun pingyi de daolu
gu ni dang jiaohui zhongren, ruguo jiaohui you bi yu tamen dehua
Wei zhu de ren, jiang juewu
boming de ren, jiang tuibi
ta jiang ru yu dahuo
ranhou, zai huo li busi ye bu huo
Chunjie zhe biding chenggong
ta jinian ta de zhu de zun ming, er jin shou bai gong
